title: Marketing Strategy & Analytics Specialist for GHL SaaS
job_overview:
Join our growing SaaS team as the strategic marketing brain behind our lead generation and conversion optimization!

About Us

We provide Beyond the Salon CRM - a GoHighLevel-powered platform for beauty professionals. We help salon owners, permanent makeup artists, and beauty businesses scale through automation and streamlined operations.

The Role

Part-time position (10-15 hours/week) as Marketing Strategy & Analytics Specialist. 

You'll be the analytical force behind our lead generation and conversion optimization, working primarily within GoHighLevel as our central marketing command center.

You'll work WITH our GHL specialist who handles technical construction while you focus on strategy, optimization, and performance analysis.

Key Responsibilities

Analyze campaign performance and identify optimization opportunities
Design A/B testing strategies for ads, landing pages, and email sequences
Optimize conversion rates across the complete customer journey
Track performance using GoHighLevel analytics plus external tools
Create performance reports with actionable optimization recommendations
Monitor campaigns, pipelines, and automations within GoHighLevel
Provide strategic direction to technical GHL specialist for improvements

Required Qualifications

2+ years performance marketing strategy and optimization experience

Working knowledge of GoHighLevel - can navigate, analyze, and optimize within platform

Conversion rate optimization expertise with proven improvement track record

Advanced analytics skills with Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, conversion tracking

B2B SaaS marketing experience preferred

Advanced Excel/Google Sheets for data analysis and reporting

What We Offer

Performance Bonuses: Monthly bonuses based on conversion rate improvements
Commission Opportunities: Performance-based incentives tied to lead quality and customer acquisition
Growth Potential: Opportunity to expand to full-time as business scales
Part-time remote: Flexible scheduling with some US business hours overlap

How to Apply

Subject Line: "Ready to Optimize Beauty SaaS Conversions"

Include:

Experience Summary: Your performance marketing and optimization background
GoHighLevel Knowledge: Your experience level with GHL platform
Results Examples: Specific conversion rate improvements you've achieved
Availability: Your preferred working hours and schedule

End your application with: "Data-driven strategy drives results!"
